title: Account disappeared after bugged transfer
body:
I believe my account is stuck in a limbo between servers.. I transfered to NA from LAN and it was taking a long time saying "account is transferring please wait a few minutes" i waited for a few minutes then i was able to log back onto LAN and i bought it again (the rp for the transfer was still there.) I played a game then when i tried to relog because my shop was bugged it wouldnt let me log in on any server.. Help?

https://i.gyazo.com/b685e7f6bb1bc6da3bf30e4c35058378.png (Match history) https://i.gyazo.com/3f9bde80790a0541390d4a5bf47b7bb9.png (trying to look it up ingame)

replies.body: Are you connected to the correct region on the client?  Even though you transfer, the patcher won't automatically update your region on the login screen.  Did you also have to change your username after transferring?  If you've already got a ticket open, our specialists should be able to help.  Let me know the ticket number, and I'll be happy to check on the status (if it's in English).

(30105146) I tried logging into all regions.. i didnt change the user name. When i try to change the pass it doesnt even email me. its like the account is gone? but its still on op.gg not on lolking or anything.. its weird..
Thanks!  Your ticket has been received and sent to our account team.  We're looking into this (me too!), hang tight and we'll reach out to you there!
Hey i cant respond to ticket because i cant log in to check the ticket but do you have any idea how long it will take? a day or a few? Doesn't matter just curious :)
also i sent in a ticket (not under this account but for account recovery :/) because i cannot log in at all its like it just vanished.
"Neednewign" being my smurf account i transfered here
